1.0.name: wordpress/post-it-notes
1.0.description: After installing and activiating the plugin you will see a new widget in your widgets called Sticky Notes. You can also add Sticky Notes to posts and pages with a simple shortcode. eg [stickynotes title="My Title" url="http://www.google.com"]My content goes here[/stickynotes] The plugin uses the google api to retrieve the font (http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Reenie+Beanie:regular) to help make it look lovely.
